articles.description: At the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX), gold futures with expiry due on April 5 rose marginally by Rs 42 to Rs 56,270 per ten grams on Sunday. In the previous session, the precious metal quoted Rs 56,228 per ten grams at close.
